content: vientos cabled hat by andrea riddle vientos is a soft superwash yarn that is perfect for hat knitting this hat was modeled after the noventa hat pattern and is a great way to learn cables materials 1 skein malabrigo vientos vientos 130 yards per 100g skein 100% superwash wool hand wash dry flat needles 16 us #9 and us #10 and 32 us #10 for magic loop cable needle stitch marker removable stitch marker and tapestry needle using the us #9 needle cast on 78 stitches using the german twisted cast on or cast on method of your choice join in the round being careful not to twist place marker for beginning of round row 1-8 *k3 p2 k2 p2 k2 p2* repeat note you may place stitch markers between repeats to make the pattern easier to follow if you would like to fold up the brim add 2 more row here switch to us #10 needle row 9-11 *k3 p2 k6 p2* repeat row 12 k3 p2 3/3lc p2* repeat helpful hint place a removable stitch marker on the second purl stitch the one right before the first cable this will help you count the row between cable rounds row 13-19 *k3 p2 k6 p2* repeat row 20 repeat row 12 repeat 13-20 until you have completed a total of 5 cable patterns you will have 5 cable twists © andrea riddle 1 begin the decreases 1 *k3 p2tog k6 p2* repeat 2 *k3 p1 k6 p2tog* repeat 3 *k3 p1 k6 p1* repeat 4 *cdd p1 k6 p1* repeat 5 *k1 p1 k6 p1* repeat 6 *k1 p1 3/3cdl p1* repeat 7 *k1 p1 k2 ssk k1 p1* repeat 8 *k1 p1 k4 p1* repeat 9 *k1 p1 k2tog ssk p1* repeat 10 *cdd ssk* repeat 11 k2tog around cut yarn leaving a long tail using your tapestry needle pull yarn through live stitches to bind off abreviations k knit p purl bor beginning of round k2tog knit 2 stitches together knitwise ssk slip two stitches one at a time knitwise then knit them together through the back loop 3/3lc slip 3 stitches to a cable needle and hold in front knit the next 3 stitches on the left needle return the 3 slipped stitches back to the left needle and knit them you can knit them directly off the cable needle a well cdd center double decrease slip 2 stitches together as if to knit them together knit next stitch pass both slipped stitches over the knit stitch 3/3cdl slip 3 stitches on to a cable needle and hold in front k1 k2tog knit the 3 stitches from the cable needle © andrea riddle 2
